text: But as for the Gentiles who have become believers, we have 21:25 written a letter ¦ sent word SBL WHwritten a letter with our judgment 21:25 that they should observe no such thing, except 83.8% {HF 4.4%} ¦ --- CT 2.1%that they should observe no such thing, except that they should keep themselves from what has been sacrificed to idols, from blood, from what has been strangled, and from fornication.”
